name: Between the Brain And the Guts
name_original: Between the Brain And the Guts
description:
The world from the game Between the Brain andthe Guts it is supposed to represent irrationality and nonsense existence. Breakout, the name of the game world is dystopian place where humanoid mutants wander in strange lands. They are looking for one solace from the overwhelming one madness. Individual fragments of the Wyrwa are known only from the old map. Events the game takes place between lands: Brain and Guts. The game is happening from the perspective of the mutant who is the main one the protagonist of the game. The hero wakes up from the world Inner, reality, reality in which he lived in peace and ignorance.Escape to the Inner World mutant protect himself from madness by Wyrwa. Despite this, The Inner World only gave momentary relief. The mutants were slowly waking up from playing reality. Shock when you wake up in madness mutants, and in some cases were even committed suicide.

Game design: Marcin Mądzik
Music: The LONGING - Original Soundtrack
Composers: Lord Redstone, Spectral Kingdom,
Erdstall, Dungeontroll, and Vindkaldr
